author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all.
Addresses https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33693#issuecomment-839065049.
Do not use HP flag for HLT tracks when compiling Alignment validation plots with vertices.

#### PR validation:

Run `runTheMatrix.py -l 12434 --ibeos -t 4 -j 8`
Plots that were empty before are now filled.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/117885478-30efaf00-b2ae-11eb-861d-c792d78ffad9.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
cc: @mtosi
title: PrimaryVertexMonitoring: don't use HP flag for Alignment plots at HLT
